channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Intel sells the fastest sub-$200 CPUs that you can buy right now and AMD can barely keep up, even with a Ryzen 9 5900XT — so I have to ask, is Intel the new AMD?
item.description: Intel’s cheapest desktop CPUs are now faster than AMD's, and Team Red is feeling pressure across the sub-$200 market.

item.title: The ‘Star Wars’ Gag in ‘Wake Up Dead Man’ Is Pure Rian Johnson
item.description: We are obsessed with the 'Star Wars' joke in the latest 'Knives Out' film, now on Netflix.

item.title: How a Spanish virus brought Google to Málaga
item.description: Spanish entrepreneur Bernardo Quintero, whose company is at the root of Google's Málaga cybersecurity hub, identified the author of the computer virus that influenced his career.

item.title: Corsair’s new Void v2 MAX Wireless takes one of the best mid-range gaming headsets and makes it even better
item.description: Corsair's new Void v2 MAX Wireless model updates its predecessor with improved connectivity and smarts. With such a small difference in price and features, it’s the natural choice for most gamers, making a great headset even greater.

item.title: Waymo Has to Pay People $22 to Close Stuck Robotaxi Doors
item.description: It turns out human drivers are good for more than just driving.

item.title: The best PS5 accessories for 2026
item.description:
Sony's latest console may be a few years old at this point, but it's still got plenty to offer — including some of the best games of this generation. Whether you just got a new PS5 or PS5 Pro, or you've had yours for a little while, you may want to give it a refresh of sorts by investing in some new accessories. Luckily, there are tons to choose from. These are the best PS5 accessories we've come across, plus some of the best games you should try out if you haven't already. Best PS5 accessories
This article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com...

item.title: The best distraction blockers to jumpstart your focus in the new year
item.description: Whether you need to limit social media scrolling or block off time to be productive, there are different tools that can help you stay on task

item.title: TV winners and losers 2025: OLEDs got even brighter, and 8K (still) strained for relevance
item.description: It’s been a stellar year for Samsung and OLED tech, yet Amazon panels have floundered as 4K Blu-rays continue to fight to merely exist.

item.title: This is where to find the best PS Plus and gift cards for your new PS5
item.description: Just got your hands on a PS5? Here's where to top up your store credit cheaply.
